sentences.english: Few data on air pollution exposure and risk of venous thrombosis are available.
sentences.chinese: 但是关于空气污染与静脉血栓关系的数据却很有限。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of mesenteric vein thrombosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肠系膜静脉血栓形成的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Clinical Study on the Pathogenic Characters of Extremity Superficial Thrombophlebitis;
sentences.chinese: 目的观察散瘀止痛汤治疗血栓性静脉炎的效果。

sentences.english: The result demonstrated the type of thromboses external hemorrhoids had a significant effect.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现血栓性外痔有显著的疗效。

sentences.english: To observe and compare the antithrombotic effects of myricetin dispersible tablets and myricetin dripping pills.
sentences.chinese: 观察并比较杨梅素滴丸与杨梅素分散片的抗血栓作用。

sentences.english: Objective To screen antithrombotic fraction of Herba Siegesbeckiae.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选出豨签草抗血栓有效组分。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of promoting blood circulation and removing blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察抗血栓药材水提物的活血化淤作用。

sentences.english: Does dementia increase risk of thrombolysis?
sentences.chinese: 痴呆能否增加血栓溶解风险？

sentences.english: Pulmonary embolism 2010 - what is really new?
sentences.chinese: 肺血栓栓塞症2010，真正的进展是什么？

sentences.english: This is the webpage of Thrombosis Research.
sentences.chinese: 这是《血栓病研究》的网页。

sentences.english: Object:To explore the methods of acupuncture and acupoint selection to increase the effect of head acupuncture on treatment of cerebral thrombosis hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 探讨提高头针治疗脑血栓偏瘫疗效的针刺及取穴方法。

sentences.english: Anticoagulant therapy is the treatment of choice for cancer-associated thrombosis.
sentences.chinese: 抗凝治疗可用来治疗癌症相关血栓形成。

sentences.english: Conclusion: Xueshuantong Injection has marked actions of promoting blood circulation and relieving blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 结论血栓通注射液具有明显的活血化瘀作用。

sentences.english: Clinical Study on the Pathogenic Characters of Superficial Thrombophlebitis;
sentences.chinese: 目的观察散瘀止痛汤治疗血栓性静脉炎的效果。

sentences.english: The dominant mechanism by which interventional ultrasound energy dissolves thrombi is acoustic cavitation.
sentences.chinese: 超声介入消融血栓的主要作用机制是声学空化效应。
